alert.note: Alert for Furnas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Furnas County through 100 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cambridge, or 24 miles east of McCook, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Wilsonville and Hendley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
